title: Oscar Mayer Wienermobile Damaged In Pennsylvania Crash
teaser: Once it was clear no one was hurt, readers of Pennlive.com were inspired. One reader asked: "What do you get when you crash the Wienermobile into a snowbank?" The answer: "A Chili dog."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
